footer.p: GROWWE is a biodegradable soil alternative produced in Egypt from natural resources. GROWWE is a a sustainable eco-friendly solution developed with British technology by a license from Scaletek UK. GROWWE utilizes natural organic resources to contribute to organic agriculture while enhancing soil quality for horticulture, landscaping and farming.

mulch.title: Mulch
mulch.content: Mulch is a protective layer of material spread on top of the soil to protect it and decorate your landscape. Think of it like a blanket for your garden. Mulch protects the soil and the plants growing in it. It is natural, organic and reusable.

whoWeAreSection.whoDes: We are dedicated to producingÂ high-quality alternative soilÂ from Egyptâ€™s rich natural resources.
whoWeAreSection.missionDes: We aim to provideÂ eco-friendly, sustainable growing mediaÂ that empowers farmers, gardeners, and agricultural businesses to grow premium quality plants while protecting the environment.
whoWeAreSection.visionDes: To lead the global shift toward sustainable cultivation by innovating plant-based solutions that are kind to the earth and productive for farmers.

calculator.title: Calculator

gardeningSection.title: GARDENING
gardeningSection.des1: Grow Green, Naturallyâ€”Healthy Soil for a Healthier Harvest!
gardeningSection.des2: Alternative soil is slightly acidic (pH ~5.5-6.5)â€”perfect for blueberries, azaleas, and ferns. For neutral-pH plants, balance with a bit of garden lime.

thirdSection.des1: Alternative soil is sterile and lightweightâ€”perfect for seed trays!Â Mix with vermiculite (3:1 ratio) to prevent damping-off disease and promote strong seedling roots.
thirdSection.header2: Pro Tips for Starting Seeds in Alternative Soil
thirdSection.point1: Pre-Moisten:Â Always soak alternative soil before sowing!
thirdSection.point2: Mix for Drainage:Â Add 20% perlite or vermiculite to prevent compaction.
thirdSection.point3: Warmth is Key:Â Use a heat mat (75â€“80Â°F) for tropical seeds (e.g., orchids).
thirdSection.point4: Cover for Humidity:Â Stretch plastic wrap over trays until germination.
thirdSection.point5: Transplant Early:Â Palm peat breaks down fastâ€”move seedlings once 2â€“4 true leaves appear.
thirdSection.des2: Pre-planting hack: Solarize soil with clear plastic for 2 weeks, then amend with palm peat to kill weedsÂ andÂ boost acidity.

secondSection.soilPra1: GROWWE peat is a soilless growing media. Itâ€™s a biodegradable soil alternative produced from natural resources. GROWWE is a sustainable eco-friendly solution that utilizes natural organic resources to contribute to organic agriculture, while enhancing soil quality for horticulture, landscaping and farming.
secondSection.mulchPra1: GROWWE mulch is a 100% natural organic material applied to the surface of soil, used in gardening and landscaping. GROWWE mulch is a 100% organic, free from chemicals, that helps nourish the soil and support its aeration while improve its quality. Mulch isÂ a protective layer for the soil that helps retain moisture, improve soil structure and protect plants.
secondSection.mulchPra2: Our premium mulch is designed to provide growers and landscapers with a reliable, sustainable solution for soil coverage and crop protection. Made from 100% natural materials, it enhances soil moisture retention, regulates temperature, and helps control weed growth while gradually enriching the soil as it decomposes. With its consistent quality and easy application, our mulch is an effective way to improve plant health, reduce maintenance, and support environmentally responsible cultivation practices.

thirdSection.soilDes: GROWWE peat Â stands out from other soil alternatives because of its distinctive features:
thirdSection.soilDes1: Growwe is resistant to microbial degradation and its ability to maintain its biological and structural properties over time for plant cultivation.
thirdSection.soilDes2: Because it retains its structure and does not compact easily, GROWWE peat can be reused for several cultivation cycles, providing excellent value.
thirdSection.soilDes3: Growwe provides the necessary aeration, consistent moisture, and antifungal properties that healthy roots need to develop.Â It creates an ideal environment for root formation, allowing root hairs to efficiently absorb water and nutrients once they are introduced through fertilization.
thirdSection.mulchDes: GROWWE mulch enhances soil health, reduces maintenance, and promotes stronger plant growth.
thirdSection.mulchDes1: Mulch acts as a barrier between soil and air, significantly reducing water loss through evaporation. This consistent moisture level means less frequent watering is required, promoting a more resilient root system.
thirdSection.mulchDes2: A layer of mulch absorbs the impact of heavy rain and slows the flow of water across the surface. This prevents topsoil, a vital resource, from being washed away.
thirdSection.mulchDes3: As organic mulch decomposes, it adds valuable humus and nutrients to the earth. This process improves soil structure, aeration, and fertility over time, creating a healthier growing environment.
